modals.feedbackDescription: We are a small team and we would love your input on Piggus, we really appreciate it!
modals.roadmapDescription: Exciting features coming to Piggus! Here's what we're working on:
modals.supportUsMessage: Hey there, thanks for clicking on this button, we really appreciate it. For now we don't have a structured way to get financial support to help cover the costs of the app but please share the word about Piggus, the more people join us the more chances we have to grow and build together a great product! ðŸ’ª

auth.recoveryKeySubtitle: Save this recovery key to restore your account if you forget your password
auth.recoveryKeyWarning: This is the ONLY way to recover your account. Store it safely and never share it with anyone.
auth.recoveryKeyInstructions: How to store your recovery phrase safely:
auth.recoveryKeyInstruction1: Write these words down in exact order on paper
auth.recoveryKeyInstruction2: Never store it digitally (no screenshots or cloud storage)
auth.recoveryKeyInstruction4: Keep multiple copies in different secure locations
auth.recoveryKeyAcknowledgment: I have safely stored my recovery key and understand I will lose access to my data if I lose both my password and recovery key.
auth.bip39Compatible: This uses the BIP39 standard compatible with major security systems
auth.doingSomeMagic: Doing some magic to set you up
auth.enterPasswordToUnlock: Please enter your password to unlock your encrypted data

auth.authenticateToUnlock: Authenticate to unlock your encrypted data

addInvestment.title: Add Investment
addInvestment.createPortfolioFirst: You need to create a portfolio first before adding investments.
addInvestment.symbolLookupInstruction: Add Symbol and find the investment for automatic addition, then it will also get the current price when you open the app (once a day).

banking.connectBankAccount: Connect your bank account to automatically get all your expenses
banking.connectBankDescription: Securely connect your bank account to automatically import and categorize your expenses.
banking.privacyInfo: Getting automatically your transactions means we can't provide the same level of privacy for those.
banking.fraudProtectionInfo: Our third-party provider monitors transactions for fraud protection and regulatory compliance.
banking.thirdPartyInfo: Connection is handled by our secure partner to ensure your credentials stay safe.
banking.oneBankRestriction: Please note: You can only have one connected bank account for your subscription.
banking.selectCountryDescription: Choose the country where your bank is located to ensure proper connection.
banking.syncErrorMessage: Failed to sync bank transactions. Please try again.
banking.disconnectSuccess: Your bank account has been disconnected successfully.
banking.disconnectError: Failed to disconnect bank account. Please try again.
banking.selectBankDescription: Choose your bank from the list below to connect your account.
banking.noBanksFound: No banks found matching your search

banking.bankConnectedSuccess: Your bank account has been connected successfully!
banking.webViewError: Failed to load bank authentication page. Please try again.
banking.failedLoadInstitutions: Failed to load bank institutions. Please try again.
banking.premiumRequired: Premium subscription required to access bank data.
banking.bankConnectionExists: You already have an active bank connection. Only one connection is allowed.
banking.bankServiceUnavailable: Bank data service is currently unavailable.
banking.failedCreateConnection: Failed to create bank connection. Please try again.

version.newVersionDescription: A new version of Piggus is available. Update from version {{current}} to {{latest}} to get the latest features and improvements.
version.updateRequiredDescription: This version of Piggus ({{current}}) is no longer supported. Please update to version {{mandatory}} or later to continue using the app.
version.appWillNotWorkWarning: The app will not function properly until you update to the latest version.
version.updateRequiredTocontinue: You must update to continue using Piggus
version.versionCheckErrorMessage: The version checking system encountered an error, but the app will continue to function normally.

onboarding.initialBankAccountBalance: Initial bank account balance added during onboarding
onboarding.personalizeJourneyDescription: Help us personalize your financial journey by sharing a few details.
onboarding.monthlyBudgetQuestion: What is your current monthly salary?
onboarding.bankAmountQuestion: How much money do you currently have in your bank account (not invested)?
onboarding.monthlyBudgetHelper: This will be used as your monthly budget to track your spending
onboarding.bankAmountHelper: This will be added as a checking account investment to track your cash
onboarding.skipAndManage: Skip and manage on my own
onboarding.oneMoreStepDescription: One more step! We need to create your profile to store your encrypted data.
onboarding.shareWithFamilyDescription: You can share your things with family and friends. This means that they will need to be able to find you. Unless you choose a unique name, you will be assigned something random.
onboarding.usernameRules: Only letters and numbers allowed (3-20 characters). No spaces or special characters.
onboarding.defaultCurrencyHelper: This will be your default currency for expenses and budgets
onboarding.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters long
onboarding.usernameMaxLength: Username must be no more than 20 characters long
onboarding.usernameAlphanumeric: Username can only contain letters and numbers (no spaces or special characters)
onboarding.usernameAlreadyTaken: This username is already taken. Please choose a different one.
onboarding.failedGenerateUsername: Failed to generate a unique username. Please try again or provide a custom name.
onboarding.cannotCreateProfile: Cannot create profile: No user is logged in

budget.failedSetBudget: Failed to set budget. Please try again.

expenses.title: Expenses
expenses.startTrackingExpenses: Start tracking your expenses to get insights into your spending
expenses.setupRecurringExpenses: Set up recurring expenses to automate your tracking

slide1.title: We're Just Getting Started
slide1.subtitle: A startup with big dreams
slide1.description: We're a passionate startup working hard to bring you amazing new features. Your feedback helps us build the perfect financial companion for you!

slide2.title: Manage & Share Expenses
slide2.subtitle: Track your spending effortlessly
slide2.description: Keep track of your personal expenses and easily share costs with friends, family, or roommates. Split bills, manage group expenses, and never forget who owes what.

slide3.title: Investment Tracker
slide3.subtitle: Grow your wealth smartly
slide3.description: Monitor your investment portfolio, track performance, and make informed financial decisions. Keep all your investments organized in one secure place.

slide4.title: Privacy & Security
slide4.subtitle: Your data stays yours
slide4.description: End-to-end encryption ensures your financial data remains completely private. We use zero-knowledge architecture - not even we can see your personal information.

subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.planDescription: Select the plan that best fits your needs and unlock powerful features to manage your finances better.

free.title: Free
free.description: Perfect to get started with expense tracking

premium.title: Premium
premium.description: Unlock all features and support our development

monthly.title: Premium Monthly
monthly.description: Full access to all features with monthly billing

annual.title: Premium Annual
annual.description: Best value - save money with annual billing

features.investmentImport: Automatically add extra information during investment creation
features.investmentsUpdate: Automatically update daily ETF, Stocks, Funds, Certificates and Cryptocurrencies current price

subscription.managementDescription: Manage your subscription through your device's app store to cancel, change plans, or view billing history.
subscription.manageInstructions: To cancel or modify your subscription, you'll need to do so through your device's app store. This will open the subscription management page.
subscription.cancelInstructions: To cancel your subscription, you'll need to go to your device's app store subscription settings. Your subscription will remain active until the current billing period ends.
subscription.bankNote: Bank import is only available in EU countries and limited to one bank account.
subscription.termsNote: Subscription can be managed directly in the store.
subscription.purchaseSuccess: Your subscription has been activated successfully!
subscription.restoreSuccess: Your purchases have been restored successfully.
subscription.initializationError: Failed to load subscription information. Please try again.
subscription.purchaseError: Failed to complete purchase. Please try again.
subscription.restoreError: Failed to restore purchases. Please try again.
subscription.restoreTimeout: Restore purchases timed out. Please try again.
subscription.loadErrorDescription: We're having trouble connecting to the subscription service. Please check your internet connection and try again.
subscription.limitedMode: Limited features available. Some subscription options may not display correctly.
subscription.deviceSubscriptionSettings: Please go to your device settings to manage subscriptions

autoRenewal.monthly: Automatically renews monthly unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
autoRenewal.yearly: Automatically renews yearly unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
autoRenewal.default: Automatically renews unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
